alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 6:17PM CDT until August 07 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Northeastern Logan County in west central Kansas... Southwestern Sheridan County in northwestern Kansas... Northwestern Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 616 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Gem, or 10 miles southeast of Colby, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oakley. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 56 and 90. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
